text: Yā pana bhikkhunī sugatacīvarappamāṇaṃ cīvaraṃ kārāpeyya atirekaṃ vā chedanakaṃ pācittiyaṃ
edit: Yā pana bhikkhunī sugatacīvarappamāṇaṃ cīvaraṃ kārāpeyya atirekaṃ vā chedanakaṃ pācittiyaṃ

translations.transtext: 166. Should any bhikkhunī have a robe made the size of the sugata robe or larger, it is to be cut down and confessed.
